version.name: v1
version.xform: <xf:xforms xmlns:xf="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xf:model> <xf:instance id="gen-query"> <gen-query name="General Query-v1" id="29"> <chpsid/> <facilityid/> <formname/> <sender/> <formtype>query</formtype> </gen-query> </xf:instance> <xf:bind id="chpsid" nodeset="/gen-query/chpsid" type="xsd:int" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="facilityid" nodeset="/gen-query/facilityid" type="xsd:int" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="formname" nodeset="/gen-query/formname" type="xsd:string" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="sender" nodeset="/gen-query/sender" type="xsd:int" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="formtype" nodeset="/gen-query/formtype" type="xsd:string" required="true()" visible="false()"/> </xf:model> <xf:group id="1"> <xf:label>Page1</xf:label> <xf:input bind="chpsid"> <xf:label>Staff ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="facilityid"> <xf:label>Facility ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="formname"> <xf:label>Query type</xf:label> <xf:item id="ancdefault-jf"> <xf:label>ANC defaulters</xf:label> <xf:value>ancdefault-jf</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="ttdefault-jf"> <xf:label>TT defaulters</xf:label> <xf:value>ttdefault-jf</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="ppcdefault-jf"> <xf:label>PPC defaulters</xf:label> <xf:value>ppcdefault-jf</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="pncdefault-jf"> <xf:label>PNC defaulters</xf:label> <xf:value>pncdefault-jf</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="cwcdefault-jf"> <xf:label>CWC defaulters</xf:label> <xf:value>cwcdefault-jf</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="upcomingdeliveries-jf"> <xf:label>Upcoming deliveries</xf:label> <xf:value>upcomingdeliveries-jf</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="recentdeliveries-jf"> <xf:label>Recent deliveries</xf:label> <xf:value>recentdeliveries-jf</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="overduedeliveries-jf"> <xf:label>Past EDD/no delivery</xf:label> <xf:value>overduedeliveries-jf</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="sender"> <xf:label>Response phone number</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formtype"> <xf:label>formType</xf:label> </xf:input> </xf:group> </xf:xforms>

version.name: v1
version.xform: <xf:xforms xmlns:xf="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xf:model> <xf:instance id="pat-query"> <pat-query name="Patient Query-v1" id="30"> <chpsid/> <facilityid/> <formname/> <motechid/> <firstname/> <lastname/> <PreferredName/> <dob/> <nhis_number/> <phonenumber/> <sender/> <formtype>query</formtype> </pat-query> </xf:instance> <xf:bind id="chpsid" nodeset="/pat-query/chpsid" type="xsd:int" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="facilityid" nodeset="/pat-query/facilityid" type="xsd:int" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="formname" nodeset="/pat-query/formname" type="xsd:string" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="motechid" nodeset="/pat-query/motechid" type="xsd:string" relevant="/pat-query/formname = 'upcomingcare-jf' or /pat-query/formname = 'viewpatient-jf'" action="show" visible="false()" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="firstname" nodeset="/pat-query/firstname" type="xsd:string" relevant="/pat-query/formname = 'findmotechid-jf'" action="show" visible="false()" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="lastname" nodeset="/pat-query/lastname" type="xsd:string" relevant="/pat-query/formname = 'findmotechid-jf'" action="show" visible="false()" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="PreferredName" nodeset="/pat-query/PreferredName" type="xsd:string" relevant="/pat-query/formname = 'findmotechid-jf'" action="show" visible="false()" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="dob" nodeset="/pat-query/dob" type="xsd:date" relevant="/pat-query/formname = 'findmotechid-jf'" action="show" visible="false()" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="nhis_number" nodeset="/pat-query/nhis_number" type="xsd:string" relevant="/pat-query/formname = 'findmotechid-jf'" action="show" visible="false()" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="phonenumber" nodeset="/pat-query/phonenumber" type="xsd:int" relevant="/pat-query/formname = 'findmotechid-jf'" action="show" visible="false()" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="sender" nodeset="/pat-query/sender" type="xsd:int" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="formtype" nodeset="/pat-query/formtype" type="xsd:string" required="true()" visible="false()"/> </xf:model> <xf:group id="1"> <xf:label>Page2</xf:label> <xf:input bind="chpsid"> <xf:label>Staff ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="facilityid"> <xf:label>Facility ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="formname"> <xf:label>Query type</xf:label> <xf:item id="upcomingcare-jf"> <xf:label>Upcoming care</xf:label> <xf:value>upcomingcare-jf</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="viewpatient-jf"> <xf:label>Patient details</xf:label> <xf:value>viewpatient-jf</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="findmotechid-jf"> <xf:label>Find patient ID</xf:label> <xf:value>findmotechid-jf</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="motechid"> <xf:label>MoTeCH ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="firstname"> <xf:label>First name</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="lastname"> <xf:label>Last name</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="PreferredName"> <xf:label>Preferred name</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="dob"> <xf:label>Birth date</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="nhis_number"> <xf:label>NHIS number</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="phonenumber"> <xf:label>Patient phone number</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="sender"> <xf:label>Response phone number</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formtype"> <xf:label>formType</xf:label> </xf:input> </xf:group> </xf:xforms>
